summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 23.49.008, 23.49.009, 23.49.011, 23.49.014, 23.49.025 and 23.49.058 to address lots zoned DOC1 and DMC, make revisions to regulations for achieving chargeable floor area and use of transfer of development rights and recognize the needs of museums as a part of mixed-use development in downtown.
